ad_text: Houston Methodist Sponsored Houston Methodist Hospital is hosting an In-Person Hiring Event for Patient Care Assistants on 2/6 from 10am-3pm. Houston Methodist Sponsored At Houston Methodist Hospital, the healthcare and support professionals that collaborate within our walls on a daily basis are what continues to allow us to provide care that is second to none. And they can assist the community knowing that Houston Methodist Hospital will care for them in return. Professional development, benefits to support life at work and home, competitive compensation to name a few. But perhaps most importantly - a team that truly cares about you.
